content: Looking for information about ransom attacks, I can pay a tip for valid information which I don't have about lists where can find past ransomware and their bitcoin/eth/trx addresses.Up to 50$.----While looking inside the forum for ransom events in bitcoin history found this topic: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4547124.0 (a must to be read)

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Still looking for, do not come with suggestions like: https://id-ransomware.blogspot.com or bleepingcomputer.Thank you
